listenRead.instruction: Listen to the audio while reading, 5 read-throughs.

listenRepeat.instruction:
Listen and repeat the sentences, 5 times each. 
Focus on mimicking pronunciation and intonation.

write.instruction: Write the sentences while saying them aloud.

translation.instruction:
1. Read and translate the sentences from your native language to target language verbally.
2. Read and translate the sentences from your native language to target language with pen and paper; check your results.
3. Listen to the audio and translate in the pauses.

restOfDay.instruction:
Download both audio files and add them to your playlist. 
Listen and speak with the audio files on repeat as much as you can until the next lesson.
